sidebar.delete-board-message: Are you sure you want to delete this board? All stacks and tasks will also be deleted! This action cannot be undone!
sidebar.duplicate-board-message: Are you sure you want to duplicate this board?

board.load-demo-message: It looks like it's the first time you started the app, would you like to add some demo content that shows all the features?
board.query-not-found: Ooops, nothing found matching your query
board.delete-tag-message: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? You will also lose any refference in tasks were it was assigned.

stacks.delete-stack-message: Are you sure you want to delete this stack? All tasks and attachments will also be deleted! This action cannot be undone!
stacks.mark-all-done-message: Are you sure you want to mark all tasks as done?
stacks.mark-all-todo-message: Are you sure you want to mark all tasks as to do?
stacks.archive-all-message: Are you sure you want to archive all tasks?
stacks.archive-done-message: Are you sure you want to archive all completed tasks?
stacks.copy-message:
Are you sure you want to copy this stack to the selected board?

Notice: some of the board related options will be removed (e.g.: task tags)
stacks.move-message:
Are you sure you want to move this stack to the selected board?

Notice: some of the board related options will be removed (e.g.: task tags)
stacks.click-to-add-stack-msg: Click here to add a task now

tasks.info-delete-msg: Are you sure you want to delete this widget? This action cannot be undone!
tasks.info-attachments-delete-msg: Are you sure you want to delete this attachment? This action cannot be undone!
tasks.delete-task-message: Are you sure you want to delete this task? All sub tasks and attachments will also be deleted! This action cannot be undone!
tasks.archive-task-message: Are you sure you want to archive this task?
tasks.select-save-destination: Select where you want to save the file

warnings.WRN-BOARD-ATTACH-EXISTS: An attachment with this name already exists for this task.
warnings.WRN-BOARD-DELETE-NOT-FOUND: The board you are trying to delete was not found.
warnings.WRN-BOARD-DUPLICATE-COPY-FILE: The file was not copied while duplicating the board.
warnings.WRN-BOARD-COVER-NOT-FOUND: The cover image you are trying to attach was not found.
warnings.WRN-TASK-DELETE-ONE-ATTACHMENTS-NOT-FOUN: The attachment you're trying to delete was not found.
warnings.WRN-TASKS-DETACH-NOT-FOUND: The attachment you're trying to save was not found.

errors.ERR-BOARD-LIST: There was a problem while loading the boards list!
errors.ERR-BOARD-NOT-FOUND: There was a problem while loading the board. The board file was not found!
errors.ERR-BOARD-LOAD-ONE: There was a problem while loading the board data!
errors.ERR-BOARD-SAVE: There was a problem while saving the board!
errors.ERR-BOARD-DELETE: There was a problem while trying to delete the selected board!
errors.ERR-BOARD-DELETE-ATTACHMENTS: There was a problem while trying to delete the selected boards attachments!
errors.ERR-BOARD-COVER-COPY-ERROR: There was a problem while copying the task cover image! Please try again.
errors.ERR-TASKS-DELETE-ONE-ATTACHMENTS: There was a problem while trying to delete the attachment!
errors.ERR-TASKS-DELETE-ALL-ATTACHMENTS: There was a problem while trying to delete all the attachments from the selected task!
errors.ERR-TASKS-ATTACH: There was a problem while trying to import your attachment from the selected location!
errors.ERR-TASKS-COVER-DELETE-ERROR: There was a problem while deleting the task cover image! Please try again.
errors.ERR-TASKS-DETACH: There was a problem while trying to save your attachment to the selected location!
